Verify the scroll-top property changes accordingly, indicating scrollability
Load the homepage carousel
Verify it displays exactly 3 slides, each 960px wide and 400px high
Verify the first slide's image has source 'carousel_slide_1.jpg', alt text 'Scenic Mountain View', and is fully visible with opacity 1
Verify the navigation arrows are visible, positioned 10px from the left and right edges respectively, with aria-label 'Previous Slide' and 'Next Slide'
Click the right arrow
Verify clicking the right arrow triggers a 'fade-out' transition on the current slide taking 500ms and a 'fade-in' transition on the next slide taking 500ms
Verify on a page with 50 items and 10 items per page, the pagination controls display exactly 5 page number buttons
Verify 'Previous' and 'Next' buttons are visible
Verify page '1' is active with background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, font size 15px, and 8px horizontal padding
Verify the 'Next' button is enabled, has text 'Next', and 1px solid border #cccccc
Verify on page '5', the 'Next' button becomes disabled with opacity 0.5, and background color #eeeeee
Hover over the 'Help' icon
Verify the tooltip becomes visible after 300ms delay, positioned 10px below and centered horizontally relative to the icon, with text 'Get assistance here'
Verify the tooltip has background color #333333, text color #ffffff, 8px padding, border radius 4px, font size 12px, and a 200ms opacity transition
Verify the tooltip hides immediately when the mouse leaves the icon
Start a file upload
Verify the progress bar initially has value 0%, width 0%, height 10px, background color #e0e0e0, and border radius 5px
Verify as the upload progresses, the inner bar's width updates to reflect the value (e.g., 75% width for 75% value), with background color #28a745
Verify the percentage text (e.g., 75%) is visible, font size 14px, and color #333333
Verify the bar has a 'progress-animation' running continuously

Verify the 'Choose File' button has label 'Upload Document', text 'Browse...', background color #f0f0f0, color #333333, font size 16px, 1px solid border #cccccc, and aria-label 'Select a file to upload'
Verify the adjacent text input is initially disabled, has placeholder 'No file selected', and value is empty
Select 'report.pdf'
Verify the input's value updates to 'report.pdf' and its opacity remains 1, while the button remains enabled
Load the contact page map widget
Verify the map is visible, has width 600px, height 400px, and is positioned at x 100px and y 200px
Verify the map tiles are loaded within 2s
Verify a Google Maps 'watermark' is visible at the bottom-right corner
Verify the initial zoom level is 12
Verify exactly 3 location markers are visible on the map
Verify each location marker's label displays with font size 12px and color #ffffff on hover
Verify the map attribution text is 'Map data ©2023 Google'
Verify the product rating component displays exactly 5 star shape icons, each with width 24px, height 24px, and no border
Verify initially 4 stars are active, displaying color #ffc107
Verify the 5th star is inactive with color #e9ecef
Verify hovering over the 3rd star makes it and preceding stars active with a background color transition of 100ms
Verify the product rating component's aria-label accurately reflects the current rating value, e.g., 'Current rating: 4 out of 5 stars'
